name: Jia Zhang (张佳)
description:
Biography: I am now a fourth-year Ph.D. candidate (expected to graduate in 2024.06) at Tsinghua University, and now a member of [The System and Ubiquitous Networking Group (SUN)](http://tns.thss.tsinghua.edu.cn/sun/) led by [Prof. Yuan He](http://www.greenorbs.org/people/heyuan).
Interests: Wireless Sensing    Internet of Things    mmWave Sensing       Mobile Computing    Cross-technology Communication.
Email: thss15_zhangj@163.com;    j-zhang19@mails.tsinghua.edu.cn
